allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup for GridTopia - isometric city builder

- Godot 4.3 project structure with mobile configuration
- Core autoload systems: GameManager, GridManager, BuildSystem, Simulation, SaveSystem
- Isometric grid \(32x32\) with world/grid coordinate conversion
- Building placement with road connectivity validation
- Economy simulation with tick-based income, population growth, happiness
- Mobile controls: pan \(1 finger\), pinch zoom \(2 fingers\)
- UI: HUD, build menu, building info panel, message popups
- 4 starter buildings: road, house, factory, shop
- JSON save/load system with auto-save
- Project roadmap documentation
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive game design document

- Complete feature list for GridTopia city builder
- 40+ planned buildings across 6 categories
- City level progression system \(10 levels\)
- Economy and happiness mechanics detailed
- UI/UX specifications for mobile
- Implementation roadmap in 5 phases
- Post-MVP features planning
EOF
\)")
